quote: The greatest doer must also be a great dreamer. – Theodore Roosevelt
fact: The expression `to get fired` comes from long ago Clans that wanted to get rid of unwanted people, so they would burn their houses instead of killing them, creating the term `Got fired`.
joke: What do bees do after they are married? They go on a honeymoon.
